question: Nabi SAW recited ''ghar ul maghdubi aleyhim wa laddiiiin'' and said Ameen rasing his voice.I suppose he did not so except he was teaching us. (Ileau us Sunan, Volume 2 Page 186)
answer:
QUESTION

Please tell me the authencity's of the following hadeeth in Ileau us Sunan:

Nabi SAW recited ''ghar ul maghdubi aleyhim wa laddiiiin'' and said Ameen rasing his voice.I suppose he did not so except he was teaching us. (Ileau us Sunan, Volume 2 Page 186)

ANSWER


Share:

Al-Muhaqqiq Muhammad Zaahid al-Kawthari [ra] has verified the above Hadith as authentic. (al-Nukat al-Tarifa pg.185; Cairo). Similarly, Shaykh Ahmad Hamzatuz-Zain has verified the Hadith as Sahih (footnoted on Musnad Ahmad; Dar al-Hadith)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
